text: The secretary of state for defence (defence secretary) is a secretary of state in the Government of the United Kingdom, with responsibility for the Ministry of Defence. As a senior minister, the incumbent is a member of the Cabinet of the United Kingdom. The current secretary of state for defence is John Healey who was appointed on 5 July 2024 by Prime Minister Keir Starmer. ==References== Category:1964 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Ministries of Defence Category:Departments of the United Kingdom Government
title: Secretary of State for Defence
